mapper.insert: insert into bf_eqp_inspc values(BF_EQP_INSPC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mchnCode}, #{inspcSdate}, #{inspcEdate}, (select to_date(#{inspcEdate} + mchn_inspc_cycle,'yy/MM/dd') from BF_EQP_MCHN where mchn_code = #{mchnCode}), #{inspcActnPnt}, #{inspcActnRsn}, #{inspcRemk}, #{empId})
mapper.select:
SELECT I.INSPC_NO, M.MCHN_CODE, M.MCHN_NAME, I.INSPC_SDATE, I.INSPC_EDATE, I.INSPC_ACTN_PNT, NVL(I.INSPC_ACTN_RSN, ' ') AS INSPC_ACTN_RSN, E.EMP_ID, NVL(I.INSPC_REMK, ' ') AS INSPC_REMK FROM BF_EQP_INSPC I JOIN BF_EQP_MCHN M ON I.MCHN_CODE = M.MCHN_CODE JOIN BF_CMN_EMP E ON E.EMP_ID = I.EMP_ID
AND I.INSPC_EDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{inspcSdate}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{inspcEdate}, 'YY/MM/DD')
SELECT MCHN_CODE, MCHN_NAME, MCHN_INSPC_NXT_DATE FROM BF_EQP_MCHN WHERE MCHN_INSPC_NXT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(SYSDATE) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE+7) ORDER BY MCHN_INSPC_NXT_DATE

SELECT INP.MCHN_CODE, MC.MCHN_NAME, INP.INSPC_SDATE, INP.INSPC_EDATE, MC.MCHN_INSPC_CYCLE, INP.INSPC_NXT_DATE, INP.INSPC_ACTN_PNT, NVL(INP.INSPC_ACTN_RSN, ' ') AS INSPC_ACTN_RSN, EMP.EMP_NAME, NVL(INP.INSPC_REMK, ' ') AS INSPC_REMK FROM BF_EQP_INSPC INP JOIN BF_EQP_MCHN MC ON INP.MCHN_CODE = MC.MCHN_CODE JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON INP.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID ORDER BY INP.INSPC_EDATE
